channel.title: Need help on 2 things to do with mage
channel.description:
First thing. How i make it so when u use blood spells it heals the person what ever they hit??
Second thing. How i make it so u need runes to use magic?[br][size=1]Posted on: August 22, 2007, 01:09:38 PM[/size][hr]Oh please help :(:( really need help on this.

item.title: Need help on 2 things to do with mage
item.dc:creator: @Ill_Pk_You Ill Pk You
item.description:
@Ill_Pk_You wrote:

[quote=“Unid H4x0r, post:3, topic:135935”][quote author=Ill Pk You link=topic=187417.msg1693019#msg1693019 date=1187828478]
First thing.
How i make it so when u use blood spells it heals the person what ever they hit??
[/quote]
^ heal them? dont work

[quote author=ownage plz link=topic=187417.msg1693025#msg1693025 date=1187828605]

NewHP += hitDiff / 4; if(NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) { NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); }
[/quote] find the blood barrage spell and add that code.[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: Need help on 2 things to do with mage

[quote=“ownage plz, post:2, topic:135935”]NewHP += hitDiff / 4; if(NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) { NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); }[/quote] find the blood barrage spell and add that code.
